text: Erock may refer to: ==Bicycling== * Elephant Rock Ride, an annual bicycling event in Castle Rock, Colorado * ErokIT, a 2008 motorised bicycle ==People== *Erick "ERock" Nagel, of Opie and Anthony fame (aka Sex Bagel, aka Titty Boy, aka VicDumb) * Eric Calderone (331Erock), American heavy metal guitarist and YouTuber * Eric Friedman, also known as "Erock", American musician and member of the band Creed
title: Erock
